metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8148 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The default D-Bus access control rule in Midgard2 10.05.7.1 allows local users to send arbitrary method calls or signals to any process on the system bus and possibly execute arbitrary code with root privileges.

criterions.comment: midgard2-core: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
